# Third Party Notices

This project includes material from the W3C Design Tokens Community Group.

## W3C Design Tokens Community Group

The following files in this distribution include material copied from or derived from the [Design Tokens Community Group repository](https://github.com/design-tokens/community-group):

- `spec/` directory - Specification documents
- `schemas/` directory - JSON Schema files

Copyright © World Wide Web Consortium. https://www.w3.org/copyright/software-license-2023/
